pkgmetadata.longdescription: shipper is a power distribution tool for developers with multiple projects who do frequent releases. It automates the tedious process of shipping a software release and (if desired) templating a project web page. It can deliver releases in correct form to SourceForge, Berlios, and Savannah, and knows how to post a release announcement via freecode-submit.

use.flag: Install net-ftp/lftp for shipping to ftp sites.

For shipping email announcements. Either classic mail-mta/sendmail or mail-mta/postfix sendmail will work. All it has to be able to do is ship mail presented on standard input to a list of addresses specified as arguments.
Install virtual/sshFor shipping to websites. There are several different implementations of scp
